author: Kathi Aker
text: This Mother's Day, we're turning the tables on Congress and filibustering THEM! Our demand? Care. Can't. Wait. Sign the petition and demand a care infrastructure now. #CareCantWait https://t.co/ueGAbdULsa

author: Kathi Aker
text: .@inotivco, release the 80 beagle puppies enduring daily force-feedings of a potentially toxic drug + the two "stock" dogs who have suffered since 2019. These tests are NOT required by law & these dogs do not deserve to be killed! Allow them to be adopted into loving homes! 🐶💔

author: Kathi Aker
text: The Supreme Court is on the verge of overturning #RoevWade. But Congress can still act. Sign the petition: https://t.co/2L0TwMK3UW
